metadata.title: CVE-2019-3995 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ELOG 3.1.4-57bea22 and below is affected by a denial of service vulnerability due to a NULL pointer dereference. A remote unauthenticated attacker can crash the ELOG server by sending a crafted HTTP GET request.

criterions.comment: elog package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
